example.text: The extreme GOP border bill doesn't offer hope or protection for the vulnerable and persecuted. Instead, it eliminates asylum and humanitarian protections. This is NOT how we treat people seeking refuge at our doorstep. [[user]] [[user]] [[url]]

This new law ensures veterans suffering from the effects of toxic exposures due to their service-including exposure to burn pits, asbestos, and other toxins-will now be eligible for the health care and benefits they've earned and deserve. To help Louisiana's veterans navigate through this new process, I want to make sure you're aware of the resources available to veterans who can and should benefit from PACT Act provisions, more details can be found on the VA's website , where you can also apply for benefits.
